targets.query: SELECT local_intf_name as intf_name, device_name, source FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-cdp-oper:cdp-neighbor-details/cdp-neighbor-detail" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$switch$/) group by *
select power_consumption,max_power_drawn, last("device_name") AS "intf_name" from "Cisco-IOS-XE-poe-oper:poe-oper-data/poe-port-detail"  WHERE ("source" =~ /^$switch$/) group by *
select *, last("device_name") AS "intf_name" from "Cisco-IOS-XE-cdp-oper:cdp-neighbor-details/cdp-neighbor-detail"  WHERE ("source" =~ /^$switch$/)  group by *
select *, last("device_name") AS "intf_name" from "Cisco-IOS-XE-poe-oper:poe-oper-data/poe-port-detail"  WHERE ("source" =~ /^$switch$/) group by *

list.definition: show tag values with key = "intf_name" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$switch$/)
